ai.llm package

Submodules

ai.llm.model module

This module defines the structure of a large language model (LLM) interface.

ai.llm.model.load_model(model_name: str)[source]

Loads a pre-trained large language model.

Parameters:

model_name (str) – The name of the model to load.

Returns:

The loaded model.

Return type:

object
